author: Jonah Blocker
title: Dr. Marc Siegel: “We’ve failed, we should’ve done better”
description: This week, Bill Hemmer is joined once again Dr. Siegel discuss the progression of COVID-19 pandemic and what we now know after month of studying the virus.
content:
On the latest Hemmer Time podcast, Bill Hemmer is joined once again by physician and FOX News contributor, Dr. Marc Siegel, to break down revelations about the Coronavirus nearly a month after their previous conversation.
Dr. Siegel explains where the United… [+240 chars]
